unnormalised: Film buffs, listen up! The festival season is officially kicking off, and it's gonna be a masala of cinematic delights!
normalised: Film buffs, listen up! The festival season is officially kicking off, and it's going to be a masala of cinematic delights!

unnormalised: First up, the Kolkata Film Festival is gearing up to showcase some serious talent from around the globe, starting on the 15th of November. Expect everything from indie darlings to big-budget Bollywood blockbusters.
normalised: First up, the Kolkata Film Festival is gearing up to showcase some serious talent from around the globe, starting on the fifteenth of November. Expect everything from indie darlings to big-budget Bollywood blockbusters.

unnormalised: Meanwhile, down south, whispers are going around about a new film festival popping up in Kochi next year. Word on the street is they're planning a special screening dedicated to films celebrating Onam and Kerala's rich culture. Imagine watching a movie and then digging into some delicious Onasadya – pure bliss!
normalised: Meanwhile, down south, whispers are going around about a new film festival popping up in Kochi next year. Word on the street is they're planning a special screening dedicated to films celebrating Onam and Kerala's rich culture. Imagine watching a movie and then digging into some delicious Onasadya – pure bliss!

unnormalised: But that’s not all! Apparently, there’s also a smaller, more underground film festival happening in Dharamshala, focusing on documentary filmmaking. Expect some hard-hitting stories and insightful perspectives.
normalised: But that’s not all! Apparently, there’s also a smaller, more underground film festival happening in Dharamshala, focusing on documentary filmmaking. Expect some hard-hitting stories and insightful perspectives.

unnormalised: So, whether you're craving some serious cinematic art or just fancy a good time with some popcorn and biryani, the Indian film festival scene has got you covered. Get your tickets now, before they are all gone! Happy watching!
normalised: So, whether you're craving some serious cinematic art or just fancy a good time with some popcorn and biryani, the Indian film festival scene has got you covered. Get your tickets now, before they are all gone! Happy watching!
